text: Pastorale refers to something of a pastoral nature in music, whether in form or in mood. Pastorale may also refer to: *Pastorale (Stravinsky), a song without words from 1907 *Pastorale (album), by Stefano Battaglia, 2009 ==See also== * *Pastoral (disambiguation) *Pastoral Symphony (disambiguation) *Pastourelle, a typically Old French lyric form
title: Pastorale (disambiguation)
